CustomField.formula: IF( LEFT($UserRole.DeveloperName, 2) =="AO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c ,"AO"),True, IF( LEFT($UserRole.DeveloperName, 2) =="CA" && INCLUDES( Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c ,"CA"),True, IF( LEFT($UserRole.DeveloperName, 3) =="LAO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c ,"LAO"),True, IF( $UserRole.DeveloperName =="Admin_Marketing_HO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c ,"Marketing AO"),True, IF( LEFT($UserRole.DeveloperName, 2) =="Spv_AO" && INCLUDES( Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c ,"Spv AO"),True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Branch_Manager") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "Branch PBF Manager"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Factory") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "PBF CA Factory Head"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "AM") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "AM Business PBF / AM Business / AM Business Non NDF"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Sales") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "PBF Sales Head"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "PBF_Credit_Underwriting") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "PBF Credit Underwriting"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "PBF_Credit_Head") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "PBF Credit Head"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Risk_Credit_Non_NDF_Head") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "Risk Credit Non NDF Head"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "PBF_Head") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "PBF Head"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Chief_Marketing") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "Vice President Director / Marketing Deputy Director"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Corporate_Credit_Underwriting") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "Corporate Credit Underwriting"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Corporate_Credit_Head") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "Corporate Credit Head"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Consumer_Corporate_Credit_OPR_Head") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "Consumer & Corporate Credit Operation Head"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Credit_Operation_Head") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "Credit Operation Head"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Chief_Operation_Officer") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "Chief Operation Officer"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "Chief_Risk_Management") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "Chief Risk Management & Transformation Officer/ Risk Management Head"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "CEO_Vice_President") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "Chief Excecutive Officer + Vice President Director"), True, IF( CONTAINS($UserRole.DeveloperName, "BOD_Komisaris") && INCLUDES(Conf_Offering_Letter_Editor__c, "BOD + Komisaris"), True, False))))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Conf Offering Letter
